title: Script Font Name Required
content:
Hi Does anyone know what font this is please?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2015-02-16 at 15.26.45.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322115907/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-02-16%20at%2015.26.45.png) | 25.22 KB |
author: neiltheo75

comments.content: Have you tried asking on the Font ID forum ([[http://typophile.com/typeid])? That’s where those who really know this stuff hang out. (This is just the posh way of saying I have no clue whatsoever.)

Hi Did you notice the phrase

> All topics are welcome—except font ID requests.

under the heading of the forum where you posted this -- **General Discussions**? If you didn't notice it, would it help if it was bigger / bolder / blinking / in ALL CAPS? (No offense meant -- just trying to figure out why it gets ignored so often.)

Please ask in [the Type ID Forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322115907/http:/typophile.com/typeid).
